Method.name: CompilerMethod1
Method.Implementation: s value=##this.GetAttribute("value") s onclick=##this.GetAttribute("onclick") s style=##this.GetAttribute("style") s title=##this.GetAttribute("alt") s ID=##this.GetAttribute("ID")

Method.name: RenderStartTag
Method.Implementation:
New element Set element=##this Set %statuscode=$$$OK Do ..CompilerMethod1() Quit:$$$ISERR(%statuscode) %statuscode Do ..WriteCSPText("",1) Do ..WriteCSPText("
##($G(value))##
",0) Quit $$$SKIPCHILDREN
